ProcessDefinition.Title: Clean Map Data Service
ProcessDefinition.Abstract: <DESCRIPTION> Clean map data service provides the ability to remove map associated record. It removes from CURRENT_WAY_NODES, CURRENT_RELATION_MEMBERS, CURRENT_NODES,CURRENT_WAYS, CURRENT_RELATIONS, CHANGESET_TAGS, CHANGESETS, MAPS, REVIEW_ITEMS, ELEMENT_ID_MAPPINGS and REVIEW_MAP. </DESCRIPTION> <EXAMPLE> <URL>http://localhost:8080/hoot-services/ogc</URL> <REQUEST_TYPE>POST</REQUEST_TYPE> <INPUT></INPUT> <OUTPUT></OUTPUT> </EXAMPLE>

LiteralInput.Title: Map ID
LiteralInput.Abstract: This parameter specifies the either the ID of the map for which to prepare conflated data for review or its name. If a map name is specified, it must be a unique map name.

LiteralOutput.Title: Job Id
LiteralOutput.Abstract: This output a unique job ID string for tracking the progress.
